content.detailedDescription: I was walking in a field to meet up with some friends and i happened to look up at about a 55 degree angle to see a star like object moving at a relatively slow rate. when under observation from me the object started turn in a circular motion but not a full circle, more of a quarter cirle direction the immediately dissapeared and reappeared in a different spot. then dissappeared and reappeared in another then another all within the same area in the sky. if i was to decribe the area size in the sky i would have to say about 10 square inches. my friends were close by so when i reached them they said what was i looking at. i said i just seen a ufo. they laughed then when i was looking up at the direction it was going in.I seen it and pointed it out. they seen it go slowly in a straight line then dissappear. one of my buddies said it was a shooting star. i told him shooting stars dont move that slow and change direction.
content.summary: Witnessed star like ufo. with directional change, dissappearing and reappearing instantly.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were sitting on the patio last night, and about 11:00 pm we were looking at the sky, hoping to see some of the perseid meteor shower.
 
5 widely-spaced high-altitude ufos came from the east, heading west as a group but with individually varying speeds.  these ones looked like the “moving stars” that can be seen in so many nasa and citizens’ videos.
 
i ran into the house and got my green laser, and started circling them one by one with the beam.  two of the ufos reversed direction and took off to the east with incredible speed.  the rest slowed down individually for a few moments, and then continued their trek west.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 high-altitude ufos responded to green laser

content.detailedDescription: I am submitting a cell phone photo a friend of mine took on june 27, 2016, at 10:57 am, location is bainbridge island, washington. my friend was driving and just happened to look up when at a stop-sign. the picture may not be of interest to mufon but i did think it captured something unusual. notice the relatively straight clear path cutting through the clouds. there is no disturbance or bleeding of clouds into or along either edge of the path line (except where clouds begin to fill cleared path area after unseen object had passed).   maybe it was just a really super-duper fast jet, although there were no airplanes to be seen in the sky viewing vicinity at that time. it may be something easily explained (or not). any feedback will be truly appreciated. thank you.
content.summary: The relatively straight clear path cutting through the clouds.  there is no disturbance or bleeding of clouds into or along either edge of the path line.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting in rochester n.H. (august 11-12)

my daughter and i went out to view the perseid  meteor  shower late on thursday, august 11 at a small park in rochester n.H., and while we were looking overhead toward the south we spotted a small light moving slowly in all directions. as we watched we realized it wasn’t moving away from us. after a few minutes we realized it was shaped like a triangle with a bright light toward the front and two dimmer, green-tinted lights in the back. we also noticed that there were very faint green lines forming the triangle and connecting the three dots. it was a solid object and the lights never changed distances from one another.

the movement did not resemble a helicopter, airplane, satellite, drone or anything we had ever seen fly in the area before. it made no noise that we could hear and it clearly had nothing to do with the meteor shower. it in no way looked like a shooting star. sometimes it moved quickly to the left or right. sometimes it moved forward in the direction of the brightest light and then backed away in the direction of the two green lights. however, it always remained above us with no real pattern of movement.

we were in an open field surrounded by trees and it remained above the open area from 11:45 p.M. on aug. 11 and we left the scene on aug. 12 at 1:57 a.M.

at one point it seemed to not only move toward the spot where we were sitting, but down towards us. it then quickly backed away again to its original spot in the sky. 

while it did move some distance, it never left our sight and was almost always directly above our heads. 

i made phone calls to the pease air force base nearby and asked them to look to see if they saw anything on radar or any other equipment. however, they said they could only see flight plans and transponders. the man on the phone said he would look into our sighting further.

we also called the rochester police department and they responded with three vehicles. the officers observed our ufo and somewhat laughed it off, but nicely. both the police officers and the man from the pease air force base wondered if it might be a drone, but i do not know of any drones that are solid, triangular with three lights. it flew in so many directions for such a long period of time and made no noise of any kind. in any event, our sighting was documented by an airport and the local police. 

through the entire event the object never moved very quickly, but it did change speeds and stop and start again. 

my daughter noticed that there was a grey coloring in the solid area between the lights.  she also so on the side of the triangle lights, smaller rectangular lights separated almost like windows.

this was the first ufo sighting that either of us has ever experienced. we saw no evidence of aliens. all we saw was the object itself.
content.summary: My daughter saw a triangle with lights at all three points, lines of light between them. it moved in all directions up and down and stayed over us for over 2 hours.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the meteor shower and i noticed a light moving from south to north as i was looking east. the light had no strobes, nor did it have a trail. it appeared high in the sky, and was moving fast, it took maybe twenty seconds to disappear from view. this was repeated three more times. i went into the garden facing west. i saw two more lights, the same as the first. they travelled from east to west travelling under cassiopeia. the clouds came over and i returned inside.
content.summary: Lights moving opposed to meteor shower. no strobes. high altitude. fast moving.

content.detailedDescription: Watching another ordinary sunset on the shore of lake erie. i've watched thousands of sunsets and i've never seen anything like this. the object just appeared and stayed around hovering from above the horizon to moving closer in towards us over the water. i have no exsplanation of what this intriguing object was. glowing orange and red orb that was above the horizon hovering to the left of the setting sun. then the orb moved in closer to us and was on the right side of the sun still over the water. the orb then moved back to the left side of the sun but was still over the water and not above the horizon.  we observed the orb for more than 7 minutes before it faded into the lake and the sun was still above the horizon and it set 10 minutes later. i was amazed by the object and couldn't believe what we where seeing, i'm not sure what to believe in these days but when you see something like this with your own eyes it is very intriguing and needs an exsplanation.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Watching the sunset over lake erie when an orb appeared in the background and moved positions from the horizon then closer over the water.

content.detailedDescription: Watching another ordinary sunset on the shore of lake erie. i've watched thousands of sunsets and i've never seen anything like this. the object just appeared and stayed around hovering from above the horizon to moving closer in towards us over the water. i have no exsplanation of what this intriguing object was. glowing orange and red orb that was above the horizon hovering to the left of the setting sun. then the orb moved in closer to us and was on the right side of the sun still over the water. the orb then moved back to the left side of the sun but was still over the water and not above the horizon.  we observed the orb for more than 7 minutes before it faded into the lake and the sun was still above the horizon and it set 10 minutes later. i was amazed by the object and couldn't believe what we where seeing, i'm not sure what to believe in these days but when you see something like this with your own eyes it is very intriguing and needs an exsplanation.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Watching the sunset over lake erie when an orb appeared in the background and moved positions from the horizon then closer over the water.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was out in my garden
2. the lights
3. plane
4. it went in the night sky from north towards south with higher speed than a plane. the lights had a strange way of flashing. i have never seen before a plane or other object doing that. i took a photo because i thought it was interesting. 
5. i went back in the house to see the photos and i enhanced every image of the stars i took photos of (i was taking photos of the sky) and than i saw this photos. i felt normal, not scared. i started googling what i saw. 
6. it went out of sight like any other normal object in the night sky.
content.summary: Red/ white lights other than plane, strange shape. it caught my eye while i was taking photos of the night sky. the strange thing was the shape and the way the lights were glowing.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 5 people where standing next to my home on a pathway. we were all talking at out of nowhere there was a soundless hug orange flash in the sky in the clouds, very low, barely above homes. there was no sound. it was not lightning or fireworks. then about less than a minute later a blue flash of light occurred, then several blue pulses of light in a circular motion in the sky. all 6 of us just starred at eachother and could not understand what we just saw. massive, low, and no sound in clouds...The weather was clear, no reason for the clouds.
content.summary: Massive flash of orange light in a cloud, low to ground...Then a massive blue flash. the blue pulsating light beams in circular motion.

content.detailedDescription: Rick from kentucky. this happened around nelson co.In about 1993 at 10-11pm.Was night fishing in deatsville.On the horizon miles away 3 separate white lights ascended. one way to the left and two to the right.Hovering over the far off ridge line.Suddenly the one on the left shot over to the others at a none man made speed! stopped on a dime! i'd say it coverd a mile or two in a fraction of a second! they stayed grouped up and then, this is what gets me...They didn't just fly away or off.It was in a direction i've never seen anything go! away and up (75degree angle) and again at a speed that was not human like! seen another white light in boston kentucky a few years later.Hovering above the tree line up in the woods.Just one this time.I was like...I've seen this before.My brother and i have also seen the same red football sized orbs in the woods.I told him..I'm seeing red orbs everywhere. he said..Like that one? he was seeing them and not saying anything too! if you want to contact me, i'll give you the details. i know for a fact we're not alone.I've seen the same white light's on tv and the web.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Hovering white lights.Moving at super speed

content.detailedDescription:
While watching the meteor shower i saw clouds at 1500 ft   moving in a unnatural way like something was 
plowing threw them  but could not see ant thing at 90 degrees observation as it moved on 
se 120 degree heading  as the object attained a 80 degree itt was reveled the outer edges of a triangular craft  surrounded buy reddish orange constant burning lights it was as if you could see threw the object  i think it was a cloud combination and light pollution that made the craft
visible to the human eye  it could be recorded on wink news sky cam it is pointed in the general direction
content.summary: Ufo appeared to be aura ? was cloaked but the scattered low cloud cover with light pollution reveled

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were near the abandoned radar station to watch the perseids meteor shower. he called my intention to a large, brightly lit object in the sky hovering past the radar station, changing lights rapidly. we watched the object for nearly an hour as it hovered, dropped, rose again, faded away, and returned to hover and move around in the same area. the object emitted flashes, or what i would call booms, of light that reflected off of the clouds. it occasionally dropped concentrated light that looked like shooting stars, but they were not shooting stars. we were facing northeast and i captured our coordinates listed at the end of this narrative.  on the opposite horizon at almost due west, we saw an identical orb about 15 minutes after we noticed the first. the object was lower on the horizon and much closer than the first. it also glowed brightly with flashing lights from red to yellow to white to blue in rapid succession. it hovered for awhile and then it began its path further west, hugging the horizon the entire time. i was primarily watching the first orb, which continued to hover and move around quickly in the sky to the north and my boyfriend primarily watched the one to the west as it moved further away. both disappeared around 1 am at the same time. it was pretty exciting and certainly better than watching the perseids meteor shower.

coordinates when watching object 1: 43•0'34" n 73•41'9" w, facing 21•n (12:15am)
coordinates when watching object 2: 43•0'33" n 73•41'10" w, facing 290•w (12:40am)
content.summary: Large object in sky above radar station, hovered, dropped light, changed direction rapidly for 1 hour. identical object observed on opposite horizon w/same actions. pulsating, colored lights, both disappeared at the same time.

content.detailedDescription:
At appx 2:00 est from front porch @ 88 powers dr. castlewood va. 24224 started out one object then change to 5 chrysler shaped objects in sky@ 4:06 am est. and ongoing. strangly unphotographable
*   *
 * *
  *
and varying. and ongoing.
content.summary: From appx 2 30 -3:58 est object strangly unphotographable . sighting appx 2 + hr over zip 24224 va.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down hwy 16 from preston heading to winona to fish. i had past peterson and rounded a corner and say several cars parked half in the road with 5 people standing in middle of road. i pulled over and saw the craft over the tree line. i knew immediately it was a ufo. the object was cigar shaped with no windows, wings, engine, no sound. during the sighting i just stood and stared over the tree line. it was about 500 ft up at that point. an older gentleman who was there first said he saw it at about 150 ft from him. i was excited and in shock to see this thing. it wasn't any plane because it was too slow and not a blimp because it was too fast, and no wings anywhere nor a basket underneath. i lost sight of object over the trees
content.summary: Cigar shaped bright whitish silver craft. no wings , windows, or engine

content.detailedDescription: As i was out 🔭 meteor shower i saw a white orb object flying overhead. it was about tree top and was not 🚁, plane or 🏮. it traveled about 50 miles an hour into clouds. have video.
content.summary: Round white orb

content.detailedDescription: My family and i ( myself 37 years of age, sister 24, brother 27 and my two boys 10 and 8) were driving up interstate 15 in utah just south of salt lake city.  i was the first to notice a black object in the sky which seeemed to be about 3 miles away, about 1500 feet off the ground.  i made a joke to my boys to look there was a ufo.  my sister said its just a cloud to which i responded " i know i'm just trying to trick the boys".  i did think it was wierd that there was a single black cloud low in the sky and not all that far away.  we watched it for a few minutes still talking about it going back and forth weather it was a cloud because as we got closer so it seemed it seemed more defined edges and solid.  i decided to take pictures half thinking i was just taking pictures of a single solid black cloud.  the pictures did not turn out well because it was with a cell phone a little past sun set and zoomed to the max.  after taking several pics and looking threw what i took i looked up and there were now 3 black classic ufo shape objects.  then two and then one again.  i did not see them seperate or come back together if that is infact how there became three and then one.  it then seemed to pick up speed continuing north towards ogden.  within seconds it was gone.  my brother and i both thought the object was about 500 yards across and about half that tall.  we all at first were not excited about what we were watching but slowly realized it was no cloud and then when there were three horizontally and evenly spaced apart about 600yards we became real excited and kids a little scared.  i don't know what it was but i know it was unusual.  there was never a light on the objects.  just black.
content.summary: Black disc shape split into three then one again flew out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home from work and i happened to look up at the sky because it was getting late and i love to watch the sunset. thats when i saw the object. there were bright lights that changed colors frequently on this vehicle. it hovered for a while, turned counterclockwise, then moved rapidly to the left and then back to the right. it descended fairly quickly. when i first saw it, it was so high up that i thought it was a plane but the colors were strange. then it stopped moving so i definitely knew at that point that it was some type of ufo. i assumed it was a drone buy im still unsure. i did not see it land because it was far way. the guy who cuts our grass was there as well and he was shocked just like i was. he actually tried to get a better view once it descended by running into someones backyard but it was gone by that time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: There were bright lights that changed colors frequently on this vehicle. it hovered for a while, turned counterclockwise, then moved rapidly to the left and then back to the right.

content.detailedDescription: I first saw the object while taking the trash out to the curb.  the object looked like an airplane or helicopter in the distance, then took off super fast, and i knew it could not be one of those.  it hovered for a while with what looked like a solid non flashing white light then took off flying west and i could see only a red light, maybe another color shortly then it turned white again.  it flew super high which discounted my idea it might be remote controlled.  it was so high to where the light was a tiny dot.  then it came back down again flying east.  i tried to keep the object in the center of my camera view but it moved to fast.  it then went down below tree level and i went in to get my daughter.  when we came back out it shot up super fast from the trees and flew around again, this time closer to our home and then went back down in the same area as before which made me believe it was a remote controlled object landing with its human controller but who knows.  it was freaky weird.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Had headlight that changed brightness.  hovering then taking off fast, changing directions.  went very high at one or two occasions.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my sons house in mt. arlington new .Approximately 9:30 pm on july 10 2016 we were watching fire works  when i notice a red light to my right . it was making sharp angle turns and then hovered over the water. it look like it was pulling water out of the lake i watched this for about 20 minutes. i thought it might be a helicopter. i was in the military for 15 years and never seen a aircraft do this ever.I was amazed  and shocked . i recorded it on my phone and showed the family . the next morning the recording was missing . then the object shot off in a high rate of speed from a stand still. and was gone so quick. my step son said he has seen unusual sightings before.
content.summary: Was watching fireworks and notice it to my right making erratic movements .

content.detailedDescription: Started 9pm i whatever  did not know how to  not alone with  world  they are  here i knew  since i was  younger april 13 2016 3objets here for  every  one  too  see
content.summary: Saw this on april 132016 a triangle  shape very apparent  what it is  ufo there's 3 of them  and transformation  into a  another  ship cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: Olive in quite  town but since  2014 and2015 it's  on going  thing for me i watch a ufos  change in  too  another  ship triangle  dark blue with friends  guarded by others very special that  get to see  them april 2016 13 it's just  beautiful
content.summary: I i

content.detailedDescription: The ufo looked like a star until it moved. then it turned on a white light then turned it off and kept end moving me and my daughter watched it for about 20min. when we got home i checked my sky map to see if any rockets or satalights were near by there wasn't any and it didn't look like anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: It looked like a star at first them me and my daughter seen it move. then it looked like it turned on a set of high beams on then turned them off and started moving away we watched it for about 20min

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my son saw a u f o at night in a crisp autumn sky we stared at it and nearly 30mins later it took off into the night sky very quickly. it was there then it was not. a few weeks later i went to put some rubbish in the bin the sky was starry and clear. less than an hour later i went into my kitchen to make a drink and i felt scared there was a vibration that was reverberating through the house when i looked outside there was no stars to see for miles and miles it was terrifying. years later a work colleague told me that she had the same experience as i did. this is only a short version i have wrote it down and i now feel i need to share it with someone.
content.summary: There was two within a few weeks. one was hovering over houses, one large vibrating black object over the house

content.detailedDescription:
I was trying out my night vision camera on a jet that was circling our valley. after watching it for a good while i stopped taping and went inside and stored it on my computer.  i later when analyzing it seen what was aliens in a craft of some sort .  so now after 5 months i was going to enhance the video and when i started doing that by first turning up the brightness i noticed that the ufo / aliens were going thru a black hole..
 and this is the results ...
content.summary: Filmed 2 or 3 aliens on ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I walk my dog every night, so i am pretty used to seeing airplanes/helicopters in the sky.  pearson airport is about 20 mins away.  

when i walk the dog, i usually like to look up at the sky.  i can usually see a few stars (orion's belt,  big dipper), mars when visible.

my normal route is around the block, n, e, s, w, then back north.

as i was close to making the turn to head east, i noticed a very bright circle in the sky.  it was a very bright white in the centre, with a red and blueish outer ring continuous light.  it appeared to be very stationary in the sky.  again, i walk outside every night and see a lot of planes in the sky being close to a very busy airport.  i have never seen a light like this.  i actually stopped walking and just watched this light as it was so unusual. i didn't notice any unusual sounds and could still hear crickets chirping.

i observed the object in the north east portion of the sky.  i am in mississauga (cawthra and qew), it was fairly high in the sky, so estimates would put it out towards north york, rexdale or vaughan area.  after about a minute of watching the object, i continued walking and looked back up in the sky after about 10 seconds.  the object was gone, even though the sky was clear and i could see other planes in the sky.  the object i observed was no longer visible.
content.summary: A very right white red/purple light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Multiple occurrences in same position. no stars visible. able to tell upper atmosphered.Color of phospher burning. stationary. duration 10 minutes. have been seeing something north on the horizon at 80 degrees during summer months of july and august for a couple of years now. i have not seen appear but i have seen it just wink out. i sit outside at that time because my dog has me well trained to take him out at or around 7pm est. at first i thought it was an unusually bright star. noticed immediately that it was to bright out and sun had not set yet beyond the horizon. it was just low enough to determine with the naked eye that it had mass. i will be attempting to gather further evidence with a camera and update this report if possible.
content.summary: Multiple occurrences in same position. no stars visible. able to tell upper atmosphered.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from visiting my mum in sunbury victoria the year was 2013 and there was a super moon in the sky it was a clear night sky with no clouds to be seen and the super moon was huge that night all of a sudden at the 1 o clock position of the moon i witness a launch from the moon a deep red flame was clearly seen for several moments then it stopped and a star satellite like moving object moved away from the moon and traversed across the sky heading towards the northern sky i have looked up rocket launches and there are no deep red colour flames from the rockets as the blast off it was clearly seen in the sky as to the deep red flame and then like a satellite traveling across the sky so who is launching off the moon i was not alarmed as to seeing this launch as it occurred on a super moon which was one of the largest super moons i have ever seen and there's this red flame appearing for a short while and then stops and the object that the red flame came from now appears like a satellite in the sky it was moving in a constant speed as it conversed across the sky
content.summary: As i. was driving home i witnessed a launch from the moon at the 1 o clock position it was in 2013 late at night and a clear sky the moon was a super moon event which was impressive in itself when i witnessed a red flame the flame was deep red in colour

content.detailedDescription: Hi. please zoom in.. about ten ufos
content.summary: Interesting

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in a parking lot at a local school where i take my dogs to go play when i was looking up in the sky and i noticed a solid white cigar shaped craft headed in a straight line across the sky.  i scanned the sky and then i saw an identical craft headed from the opposite direction directly towards the first object i spotted.  they continuded to head directly toward one another, and when they got close to each other, the first craft emitted a brilliant bright light, which caused me to have to close my eyes for a second and when i reopened them, the craft were passing by each other.   after they had passed, they each contined in the opposite directions of each other, until they passed out of sight.
content.summary: I saw one white cigar craft headed straight across the sky, then noticed a second one from the opposite direction headed toward the first.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at my city sky line through binoculars facing east when i saw a interesting cloud formation over my left shoulder and turned to the north when 4 brushed aluminum looking craft shaped like footballs descended through the clouds from the northwest flying in a delta formation, and flew in a arc towards the south, giving off a vapor trail but was completely noiseless!
content.summary: Was looking at cloud formation through binoculars when 4 craft came into view in dalta formation!
